Perceptor::

Perceptor arrived to Decepticon Base and walked where MEgatron was. 
The decepticon waited that Megatron noticed him

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Megatron / Switchblade --
> 
> Megatron receives Perceptor's comm message, "Tell me back at base 
> Perceptor, I have more pressing things." His winged form glides 
> along, then cuts downward as he reaches the Decepticon base.
> 
> He lands easily in front of the base entrance, and enters as the 
> doors slide in. Warhead was being dragged behind him. First thing 
he 
> does is ditch Warhead's limp body in one of the CR chambers, then 
he 
> heads to the control room and begins waiting for the rest of what 
> Predacons he has left to return. He opens a basewide 
> comm, "Switchblade, have you finished moving all of the autoguns?" 
> 
> Switchblade replies having just finished draging the weapons to the 
> storage room, "Ya ya, i'm done here, send some troops down here any 
> time."  Switchblade starts heading back to the engine room.
> 
> "Goooood," purrs Megatron as he starts thinking of defense 
locations 
> for the auto guns as he goes over a 3d data mapped view of the 
> terrain around the Predacon base.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Perceptor:
> > 
> > "yessss" hissed Perceptor "And I was wondering if the brave 
> > Waspanator will want to help me to show that to the Great 
Megatron"
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "catmastero" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> > > "You do?" The ever curius Waspinator asked landing behind 
> Preceptor.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > Perceptor::
> > > > 
> > > > Perceptor opened his comm link and said "Megatron, I have a 
> litle 
> > > > thing to show you that could help us to win and take revange 
> of 
> > > this 
> > > > defeat..."
> > > > 
> > > >
